You plan to visit 7 European cities for 17 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You would like to visit Helsinki for 5 days. You would like to visit Dublin for 2 days. From day 8 to day 9, there is a annual show you want to attend in Dublin. You want to spend 3 days in Hamburg. You would like to visit Santorini for 2 days. You want to spend 5 days in Edinburgh. You have to attend a workshop in Edinburgh between day 1 and day 5. You would like to visit Porto for 3 days. You would like to meet your friends at Porto between day 15 and day 17 to tour together. You would like to visit Athens for 3 days.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Athens and Dublin, Dublin and Porto, Athens and Santorini, Hamburg and Porto, Edinburgh and Dublin, Edinburgh and Hamburg, Santorini and Dublin, Edinburgh and Athens, Dublin and Hamburg, Helsinki and Hamburg, Edinburgh and Porto, Dublin and Helsinki, Athens and Hamburg, Edinburgh and Helsinki.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 17 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
